item.title: Elevated tariff risks lead Bernstein to downgrade this e-commerce giant
item.description: The firm downgraded the online marketplace to market perform from outperform.

item.title: Here’s where retirement savers are flocking as Trump’s policy uncertainty shakes up stocks

item.title: One group of stocks is showing it could be resistant to the global macro worries: sports betting
